title: Gifting Chromas

embed.description: We're (re)coloring the way you play. Set the tone with new chromas.

body: I wanted to gift someone a chroma skin for Dragonslayer Vayne and I wanted to know how. So I went to the link and it said that I could gift a chroma in the 'Unlock A Skin For a Friend' section. When I pressed it I couldn't find any chromas available to gift for Dragonslayer Vayne. Is there an error of some sort?

replies.body: [Gifting chromas](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204475264-Chromas-Packs-FAQ) is currently disabled.  I don't have any eta or information on what's going on, but Kateychaos [confirmed that it's disabled](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Jxx6j3B1-gifting-chromas-bugged?comment=0001000000000000000000010000).  Hang tight until it gets enabled again.
Are there any news regarding this? since chromas are of a bit better quality content than they used to be. would be nice to get some update or feedback on plans.

IT'S BEEN 6 MONTHS

Hey, has something changed? I don't get it. Is it the new Client or why can't I gift Chromas? I wanted to gift a Vayne Chroma to MY smurf and I own the Skin but when I go to "Unlock a Skin for a friend" there is no button with Chromas or were I can select ANY Chroma. H E L P pls
Hey, can we get an update on this???  I want to gift chromas as well!!?
